response.answer_text: Artificial Intelligence is simply a computer-based program that can execute activities that usually need human intervention. This will include understanding of speech, sensory awareness, comprehension of the language, decision taking etc. Now is exactly the best time to choose this Artificial Intelligence and push your career forward. How to select the right training institute or college in this field: If you're fresher you want to graduation 4 years of Artificial Intelligence, enter any college and finish the degrees, but if you're a specialist and want to take a quick course like about 6 months, there are various institutes providing Artificial Intelligence preparation. You'll consider it easier to follow an AI course where you can both work and study. College :- Indian Institute Technology : The B.Tech. The course will have an intake of 20 students through the Joint Entrance Examination (JEE Advanced).
